description:
Why should cowboys have all the fun? Wearing a cool mountain buckle and this low-profile belt uses Repreve recycled polyester to keep your pants up wherever you're headed, whatever you're doing. Goes with your snow pants, jeans or fancy pants. Yes, it really is that versatile.

  • Stretchy elastic webbing uses Repreve® recycled polyester, is super comfy, and does away with finding the perfect hole
  • Buckle allows for precise adjustment, is easy to open and close, and won’t pinch while you play
  • Metal-free design is great for travel – no need to take it off at the airport
  • One-size design fits up to 40in. waists
  • Machine washable in case of spillage
name: Arcade Woody Belt - Unisex
